##import raw data
```{r setup, include = F}
library(vroom)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(fs)
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)

devtools::load_all()
```

##split-apply-combine

```{r}
mmash %>% 
  group_by(day) %>% 
  summarise(across(
    c(age, weight),
    list(mean = mean, sd = sd,
         max = max, min = min),
    na.rm = T
  ))
```

##Pivot longer
```{r}
mmash %>% 
  select(-samples) %>% 
  pivot_longer(c(-user_id, -day, -gender))
View(mmash)
```
